MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH45 postcode area of Peebles. Following a number of recent power cuts, caused by an underground cable fault, It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:00pm in order to safely excavate and repair the cable going to the Rosetta Road substation. This may affect the supply to your property and we will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:50pm on Saturday, 06 March 2021
